    <div><div class="footerContainer"></div><hr class="pageBreak" style="margin:18pt 0pt; ct-page-break: true; page-break-after: always;" /><div class="headerContainer"></div></div>
    <div><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 12pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 0;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-size: 12pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;"> </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: bold;margin: 0;padding: 0;">Item&#160;2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 6pt;text-indent: 0.50in;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;">On February 07, 2023, Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. issued a press release announcing earnings and other financial results for our fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 31, 2022, and announcing that management would review these results in a conference call at 4:30 pm Eastern time on February 07, 2023. A copy of the press release is being filed as Exhibit 99.1 to this Form 8-K.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 107.9%;margin-bottom: 0;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: bold;margin: 0;padding: 0;">Item 8.01 Other Events.&#160; </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 107.9%;margin-bottom: 0;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 6pt;text-indent: 0.50in;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;">On February 07, 2023, we announced that our Board of Directors has authorized repurchases of common stock with a total aggregate purchase price of $200 million, exclusive of commissions. This repurchase authorization is in addition to previously announced repurchase authorizations. The repurchase program may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; 		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">Chipotle ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">AND FULL YEAR </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;"> RESULTS</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">FY22 </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">Operating income increases </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">44.2% and comparable restaurant sales increase 8.0% as margins expand</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt solid #996633 ;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">&#xFEFF;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">NEWPORT BEACH, Calf. &#x2013; February </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> &#x2013; Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE: CMG) today reported financial results for its fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>

			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Diluted earnings per share was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$32.04</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> a </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">39.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">increase from $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2.90</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Adjusted diluted earnings per share, which e</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">xclud</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">e</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">s</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> a $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">74</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> after-tax impact from expenses related to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">certain legal proceedings</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">the 2018 </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">performance share</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">COVID-19 related </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">modification</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">corporate restructuring, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">employee separation costs, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">restaurant asset impairment and closure costs, and certain other costs, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">partially </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">offset by an unrealized gain on investments</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$32.78</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, a </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">29.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">crease from </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$25.42</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">23</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> with 202 locations including a Chipotlane</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Calibri;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&#xFEFF;</font><a name="_Hlk504391754"></a><a name="_Hlk87358549"></a>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Calibri;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;background-color: #FFFFFF;">&#xFEFF;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;Refer to definition of digital sales below. We updated the definition of digital sales in the first quarter of 2022 to include revenue deferrals related to Chipotle Rewards. We made this change to allow for a reconciliation to total food and beverage revenue as we now present In-restaurant sales.</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;Restaurant level operating margin,&nbsp;adjusted diluted earnings per share,&nbsp;adjusted net income,&nbsp;non-GAAP general and administrative expenses, and non-GAAP effective income tax rate&nbsp;are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			&nbsp;

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			&nbsp;

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">"</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">We delivered strong growth in 2022, expanding average unit volumes and restaurant level margin, while opening </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">the highest</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">number</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> of new restaurants</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> in six years</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, despite facing a challenging and fluid macro environment," said&nbsp;Brian Niccol, Chairman and CEO, Chipotle. "Our continued focus on recruiting and retaining the best people, delivering Chipotle&#x2019;s operational standards with delicious food prepared fresh daily uniquely positions Chipotle to successfully expand to 7,000 restaurants over the long term</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.&#x201D;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:9pt 0pt 4.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;">Results for the three months ended December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;">:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Total revenue in the fourth quarter was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$2.2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> billion, an increase of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">11.2%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> compared to the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. The increase in total revenue was driven by a </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">5.6%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> increase in comparable restaurant sales and new restaurant openings. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Our in-restaurant sales increased </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">17.5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in the three months ended December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, as compared to the three months ended December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, while digital sales represented </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% of total food and beverage revenue.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">100</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants during the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">fourth</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> quarter with </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">90</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> locations including a Chipotlane. These formats continue to perform well and are helping enhance guest access and convenience, as well as increase new restaurant sales, margins, and returns.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Food, beverage and packaging costs in the fourth quarter were </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">29.3%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> of total revenue, a </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">decrease</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">230</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> basis points compared to the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Food costs benefited from menu price increases</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, to a lesser extent,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> lower avocado prices</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> These benefits were</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> partially offset by inflation across the menu primarily due to higher costs for dairy </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">and </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">tortillas.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Restaurant level operating margin was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">4.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">%, an increase from </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">20.2%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> in the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">The </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">improvement</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> was primarily due to the benefit of sales leverage and, to a lesser extent, lower delivery fees associated with a lower volume of delivery transactions, partially offset by </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">wage inflation</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and higher food costs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General and administrative expenses for the fourth quarter were&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">135.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;on a GAAP basis, or&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">129.4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;on a non-GAAP basis, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">excluding $3.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">related to certain legal proceedings</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million for a COVID-19 related modification to our 2018 performance shares made in December 2020</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, and </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">0.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million related to corporate restructuring</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> administrative expenses for the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">fo</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">u</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">rth</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> quarter of 2022 also include $11</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.9 million of underlying general and administrative expenses, $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of non-cash stock compensation</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and an $8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">benefit from lower performance-based bonus accruals</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The GAAP effective income tax rate was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in the fourth quarter of 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, compared to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20.3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The increase in the tax rate</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> primarily due </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">to lower excess tax benefits from equity vesting and exercises</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, and a </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">net increase in uncertain tax position reserves</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> in 2022 compared to 2021</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> On a non-GAAP basis, the 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> fourth quarter effective income tax rate was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">25.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Net income for the fourth quarter of 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$223.7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million, or </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$8.02</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> per diluted share, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">compared to</font><font style="display: million, or </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$4.69</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> per diluted share, in the fourth quarter of 2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">02</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Excluding the after-tax impact of </font><font style="display: million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: 		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk87358571"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">During the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">fourth </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">quarter, our Board of Directors approved the investment of up to an additional $200 million, exclusive of commissions, to repurchase shares of our common stock, subject to market conditions. Including this repurchase authorization, $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">413.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million was available as of December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The repurchase authorization may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time. We repurchased $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">98.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million of stock at an average price per share of $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1,486.74</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> during the fourth quarter.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Results for the full year ended December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Total revenue for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$8.6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> billion, an increase of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">14.4%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> compared to 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The increase in total revenue was driven by a</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">n</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">8.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% increase in comparable restaurant sales and new restaurant openings.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> Our in-restaurant sales increased </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">26</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% for the year ended December 31, 2022, as compared to the year ended December 31, 2021, while digital sales represented 3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.4% of total food and beverage revenue.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">36</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants during the year, bringing the total restaurant count at year-end to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3,187</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. Of the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">236</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants opened during the year, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">locations </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">included a Chipotlane. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We had</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> a total of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">571</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> Chipotlanes as of year-end.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;font-size:8pt;"> Restaurant level operating margin, adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted net income, non-GAAP general and administrative expenses, and non-GAAP effective income tax rate are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			&nbsp;

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			&nbsp;

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Food, beverage and packaging costs </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">were </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">30.1%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> of total revenue, a decrease of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">50</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> basis points compared to 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">The benefit of menu price increases w</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">as</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> partially offset by inflation across the menu primarily due to higher costs for </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">avocados, packaging, dairy, beef and chicken.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">23.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, an increase from </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> in 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">The </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">improvement</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> was primarily due to the benefit of sales leverage and, to a lesser extent, lower delivery fees associated with a lower volume of delivery transactions, partially offset by </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">higher food costs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and wage inflation</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General and administrative expenses </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">for </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">were&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">564.2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;on a GAAP basis, or&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">539.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;on a non-GAAP basis, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">excluding </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$9.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million related to certain legal proceedings, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">7.4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million for a COVID-19 related modification to our 2018 performance shares made in December 2020</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million related to corporate restructuring</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$3.5 million of employee separation costs. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and administrative expenses for </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">full year</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> 2022 also include $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">40.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of underlying general and administrative expenses, $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">84.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million of non-cash stock compensation</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> &nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">13.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million related to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">the</font><font style="display: employer taxes </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">from </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">equity vesting and exercises,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and a $10.3 million benefit from lower performance-based accruals</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk505335379"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The GAAP effective income tax rate was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">23.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in 202</font><font style="display: &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The increase in the tax rate</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> primarily due </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">to lower excess tax benefits from equity vesting and exercises</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, and a decrease in </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">tax benefits related to return to provision adjustments</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> in 2022 compared to 2021. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">On a non-GAAP basis, the 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Net income for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: million, or </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$32.04</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> per diluted share, compared to net &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">corporate restructuring, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">employee separation costs,</font><font per share was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">32.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">78</font><font style="display: 		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Definitions</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> following definitions apply to these terms as used throughout this release:</font>
		</p>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Comparable restaurant sales, or sales comps, and comparable restaurant transactions, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">represent the change in period-over-period total revenue or transactions for restaurants in operation for at least 13 full calendar months.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Average restaurant sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">refer to the average trailing 12-month food and beverage revenue for restaurants in operation for at least 12 full calendar months.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> represents total revenue less direct restaurant operating costs, expressed as a percent of total revenue.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Digital sales</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> represent food and beverage revenue generated through the Chipotle website, Chipotle app or third-party delivery aggregators. Digital sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">clude</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">s</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> revenue deferrals associated with Chipotle Rewards.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">In-restaurant sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">represent food and beverage revenue generated on-premise. In-restaurant sales includes revenue deferrals associated with Chipotle Rewards.</font></p></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="margin-left:36pt;margin-right:36pt;">
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;font-size:8pt;"> Restaurant level operating margin, adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted net income, non-GAAP general and administrative expenses, and non-GAAP effective income tax rate are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			&nbsp;

		</p>

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			&nbsp;

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conference Call Details</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Chipotle</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">will</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> host a conference call on Tuesday, February </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, at 4:30 PM Eastern time</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">to discuss fourth quarter and full year 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> financial results</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, as well as provide a business update for the 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> first quarter.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">conference</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> call can be accessed live over the phone by dialing 1-888-317-6003</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> or for international callers by dialing 1-412-317-6061</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and use code: </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">4324468</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">. The call will be webcast live from the company's website on the investor relations page at ir.chipotle.com/events. An archived webcast will be available approximately one hour after the end of the call.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">About Chipotle</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE: CMG) is cultivating a better world by serving responsibly sourced, classically-cooked, real food with wholesome ingredients without artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. Chipotle had </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">nearly</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">3,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">00</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> restaurants as of December 31, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, France and Germany and is the only restaurant company of its size that owns and operates all its restaurants. Chipotle is ranked on the Fortune 500 and is recognized on the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">2022</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> list for Fortune&#x2019;s Most Admired Companies. With </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">over</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> 100,000 employees passionate about providing a great guest experience, Chipotle is a longtime leader and innovator in the food industry. Chipotle is committed to making its food more accessible to everyone while continuing to be a brand with a demonstrated purpose as it leads the way in digital, technology and sustainable business practices. For more information or to place an order online, visit </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#C08C19;background-color: #FFFFFF;">WWW.CHIPOTLE.COM</font><font style="display: inline;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Forward-Looking Statements </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">Certain </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">statements in this press release and in the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">February</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">, conference call are forward-looking statements as defined in the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, including statements under &#x201C;Outlook&#x201D; about our goals for number of future Chipotle restaurants, restaurants with Chipotlanes and rate of expansion, future comparable restaurant sales growth, future estimated tax rates, future cash flow, and future long-term prospects. We use words such as &#x201C;anticipate&#x201D;, &#x201C;believe&#x201D;, &#x201C;could&#x201D;, &#x201C;should&#x201D;, &#x201C;may&#x201D;, &#x201C;approximately&#x201D;, &#x201C;estimate&#x201D;, &#x201C;expect&#x201D;, &#x201C;intend&#x201D;, &#x201C;project&#x201D;, &#x201C;target&#x201D;, and similar terms and phrases, including references to assumptions, to identify forward-looking statements. The forward-looking statements in this press release are based on currently available operating, financial and competitive information available to us as of the date of this release and we assume no obligation to update these forward-looking statements. These statements are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from those described in the statements, including but not limited to: uncertainty regarding the resurgence of COVID-19 infections, the circulation of novel variants of COVID-19 and its ultimate impact on our business, including supply chain disruptions and difficulties in acquiring restaurant equipment, impact on guest traffic, restaurant sales and operating costs and the ability of our third-party suppliers and business partners to fulfill their responsibilities and commitments; increasing wage inflation and the competitive labor market, which impacts our ability to attract and retain qualified employees and has resulted in occasional staffing shortages; the impact of any union organizing efforts and our responses to such efforts; increasing supply costs (including beef, avocados and packaging); risks of food safety incidents and food-borne illnesses; risks associated with our reliance on certain information technology systems and potential material failures or interruptions; privacy and cyber security risks related to our acceptance of electronic payments or electronic processing of confidential customer or employee information, including through our digital app; the impact of competition, including from sources outside the restaurant industry; the financial impact of increasing our average hourly wages; the impact of federal, state or local government regulations relating to our employees, employment practices, restaurant design and construction, and the sale of food or alcoholic beverages; our ability to achieve our planned growth, such as the availability of suitable new restaurant sites and the availability of construction materials and contractors; increases in ingredient and other operating costs due to our Food With Integrity philosophy, tariffs or trade restrictions and supply shortages; the uncertainty of our ability to achieve expected levels of comparable restaurant sales due to factors such as changes in consumers' perceptions of our brand, including as a result of actual or rumored food safety concerns or other negative publicity, decreased consumer spending (including as a result of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">higher</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> inflation,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> mass layoffs,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> fear of possible recession and higher </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">energy</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;"> prices), or the inability to increase menu prices or realize the benefits of menu price increases; risks associated with our digital business, including risks arising from our reliance on third party delivery services; risks relating to litigation, including possible governmental actions related to food safety incidents and potential class action litigation regarding employment laws, advertising claims or other matters; and other risk factors described from time to time in our SEC reports, including our annual report on Form 10-K and quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, all of which are available on the investor relations page of our website at ir.Chipotle.com. </font>
		</p>

					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:10.66%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>

						&nbsp;</p>

						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">(1) Average restaurant sales, excluding delivery menu price differential ("MPD") represents average restaurant sales, as defined above, adjusted to remove the impact of higher menu prices for delivery. 		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;"></font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk30523446"></a><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">C</font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">HIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL, INC.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">R</font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">ECONCILIATION OF NON-GAAP FINANCIAL MEASURES</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;">The following tables provide a reconciliation of non-GAAP financial measures presented in the text above to the most directly comparable financial measures calculated and presented in accordance with GAAP. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;">Adjusted net income is net income excluding expenses related to </font><font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">restaurant asset impairment, corporate restructuring, certain legal proceedings, stock-</font><font style="display: inline;">based compensation modification expense, unrealized gains on equity investments, separation costs, and certain other costs. Adjusted general and administrative expense is general and administrative expense excluding transformation expenses, certain legal proceedings, stock-based compensation modification expense, separation costs, and certain other costs. The adjusted effective income tax rate is the effective income tax rate adjusted to reflect the after tax impact of non-GAAP adjustments. Restaurant Level Operating Margin, a non-GAAP financial measure, is equal to the revenues generated by our restaurants less their direct operating costs which consist of food, beverage and packaging, labor, occupancy and other operating costs. This performance measure primarily includes the costs that restaurant level managers can directly control and excludes other costs that are essential to conduct our business. Management uses restaurant level operating margin as a measure of restaurant performance. Management believes restaurant level operating margin is useful to investors in that it highlights trends in our core business that may not otherwise be apparent to investors when relying solely on GAAP financial measures. We present these non-GAAP measures in order to facilitate meaningful evaluation of our operating performance across periods. These adjustments are intended to provide greater transparency of underlying performance and to allow investors to evaluate our business on the same basis as our management, which uses these non-GAAP measures in evaluating the company&#x2019;s performance. Our adjusted net income, adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted general and administrative expenses, adjusted effective income tax rate and restaurant level operating margin measures may not be comparable to other companies&#x2019; adjusted measures. These adjustments are not necessarily indicative of what our actual financial performance would have been during the periods presented and should be viewed in addition to, and not as an alternative to, our results prepared in accordance with GAAP. Further details regarding these adjustments are included in the tables below.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>

		</p>

		</p>

			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">(in thousands, except per share amounts)</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(2) Duplicate rent expense for the corporate headquarter relocation and office consolidation announced in May 2018 and rent expense for closed restaurants announced in June 2018.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(3) Asset impairment charges and other closure expenses for the corporate headquarter relocation and office consolidation announced in May 2018. </font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(4) Costs for recruitment, relocation costs, third party and other employee-related costs.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(5) Charges relate to estimated settlements for distinct legal matters that exceeded or are expected to exceed typical costs for these types of legal proceedings.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(6) Charges for a COVID-19 related modification made in December 2020 to our 2018 performance shares. </font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(7) Unrealized gain on equity investments based on a subsequent investment by an unrelated party in one of our investees, which subsequent investment represents an observable price change in an orderly transaction for a similar investment of the same issuer. </font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(8) Expenses related to an employee separation, which consist of incremental compensation costs net of forfeitures of stock-based compensation.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(9) For the year ended December 31, 2022, other adjustments consist of impairment for charges for certain corporate assets of $961. For the year ended December 31, 2021, other adjustments consist of asset impairment charges for equipment related to a discontinued restaurant initiative and certain corporate equipment of $850 and consulting fees associated with the calculation of our non-recurring tax benefit of $47.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="top" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(10) Adjustments relate to the tax effect of non-GAAP adjustments, which were determined based on the nature of the underlying non-GAAP adjustments and their relevant jurisdictional tax rates.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="top" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(11) Primarily relates to the tax benefit from the federal net operating loss generated on our federal income tax return and carried back to prior years. The tax benefit is due to the federal income tax rate differential between the 2021 and 2020 rate of 21% and the 2015-2017 rate of 35%.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
		</table></div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

				<td valign="bottom" style="width:08.36%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:right;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:01.24%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:01.24%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:08.34%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:right;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(1) Duplicate rent expense for office and restaurant closures announced in June 2018 due to the corporate restructuring and underperformance of $881 and $3,937 for the three months and year ended December 31, 2022, respectively.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(2) Charges related to estimated settlements for distinct legal matters that exceeded or are expected to exceed typical costs for these types of legal proceedings.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(3) Charges for a COVID-19 related modification made in December 2020 to our 2018 performance shares. </font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(4) Expenses related to an employee separation, which consist of incremental compensation costs net of forfeitures of stock-based compensation.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>

				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(5) For the year ended December 31, 2021, other adjustments consist of consulting fees associated with the calculation of our non-recurring tax benefit.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>

<tr><td class="hide"><a style="color: white;" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="Show.hideAR();">X</a></td></tr>

<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT

// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

<FILENAME>report.css
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
</TEXT>
